info.name: Declutter Series - Mystic Chicken Voting
info.description: Makes voting for The Mystic Chicken minecraft server easier. Removes anything not voting-related. Faithful in style to unmodified voting sites, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series
info.additionalInfo:
Server: play.mysticchicken.com

Server website: mysticchicken.com

Teamspeak: ts3.mysticchicken.com
